sentences.english: He corrupted his cousin with money.
A new British anti-bribery law, passed in 2010, appears to have been better crafted.
sentences.chinese: 英國2010年通過的反賄賂法似乎更勝一籌。

sentences.english: There have even been high-ranking government officials arrested for taking bribes from drug traffickers.
sentences.chinese: 甚至有高級政府官員因涉嫌收受毒販賄賂而被捕。

sentences.english: The corrupt official bought off those who might expose him.

And to perfect commercial bribery some views that crime legislates of our country.

sentences.english: But his sons did not walk in his ways. They turned aside after dishonest gain and accepted bribes and perverted justice.
sentences.chinese: 他兒子不行他的道，貪圖財利，收受賄賂，屈枉正直。

sentences.english: Mr. Alva says he saw it as a bribe.

sentences.english: In order to defeat the candidate for senator, the opposing party fished up an old story about a bribe.
sentences.chinese: 爲了擊敗參議員後選人，反對黨找出一樁賄賂舊案。

sentences.english: Because he was involved in the bribery, he acknowledged his mistake and resigned.
sentences.chinese: 因爲捲入賄賂案，他憤而引咎辭職。

sentences.english: In practice, many knotty problems arise in the trial of bribery and corruption cases.
sentences.chinese: 實踐中，貪污賄賂案件經常產生一些疑難問題。

sentences.english: The suggested bribery prices for hospitals in different cities are publicized on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 互聯網上公佈了中國各個城市醫院的賄賂標價。

sentences.english: And his sons walked not in his ways, but turned aside after lucre, and took bribes, and perverted judgment.
